      • buyItems

        public boolean buyItems​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> shopItems)
        Buys items selected items from the shop. Receives an ArrayList with number of items to buy at each index. Calculates cost then checks if enough money is available. Returns true if purchase is successful, false otherwise
        Parameters:
        shopItems - ArrayList of amounts of each item to buy
        Returns:

        public java.lang.String stealItem()
